data.comment: The match is underway at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Throw-in for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 4, Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Oita.
Oita to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Oita in the half of Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Oita in the half of Hiroshima.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Throw-in Oita.
In the minute 21, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Oita's half.
In the minute 34, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Oita.
Rhayner (Hiroshima) has received a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Oita a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
In the minute 44, Hiroshima drive forward but Yusuke Chajima is judged offside.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
In the minute 45, Oita have a goal kick.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Oita.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In the minute 45, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a throw-in for Oita, close to Hiroshima's area.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima's Tsukasa Morishima misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 51, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Oita.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Rhayner.
Hiroshima's Rhayner is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 59, Tomohiro Katanosaka is making the team's first substitution at Showa Denko Dome Oita with Kei Chinen replacing Daiki Watari.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 63, Oita to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Hayao Kawabe (Hiroshima) has replaced the possibly injured Rhayner.
Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) is making a second substitution, with Douglas Vieira replacing Ryo Nagai.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Oita.
Oita attack but Kei Chinen's header doesn't find the target.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Hiroshima take a 0-1 lead thanks to Tsukasa Morishima.
Douglas Vieira with an assist there.
Hiroshima make their third substitution with Yoshifumi Kashiwa replacing Shunki Higashi.
In the minute 72, The away team replace Tsukasa Morishima with Yuya Asano.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
In Oita Hiroshima attack through Hayao Kawabe. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
In the minute 77, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Free kick for Oita in the half of Hiroshima.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 80, The home team have replaced Yamato Machida with Yuji Hoshi. This is the second substitution made today by Tomohiro Katanosaka.
Toshio Shimakawa is replacing Ryosuke Maeda for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Yuki Nogami is replacing Kosei Shibasaki for the away team.
In the minute 82, Oita have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Hiroshima will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Oita.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Goal! Hiroshima extend their lead to 0-2 through Douglas Vieira.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 88, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Oita's half.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Rei Matsumoto (Oita) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
That's full-time at Showa Denko Dome Oita. The final score is 0-2.
